name: Mergulho / 04
description: The Mergulho series consists in the investigation of feelings, sensations and personalities that emerge and are intensified by the period of social isolation. A personal dive into oneself in search of self-knowledge. The paintings give voice, color and texture to internal conflicts, bringing to light the ugly, the fear and insecurities that are evoked by this moment. They reveal weaknesses, contradictions and the multiplicity of desires.
